short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block Twitter/X ads and annoying UI elements.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Twitter/X Ad Blocker hides Promoted tweets, What's happening, Who to follow, Messages drawer and Topics to follow sections.

Focus on tweets instead of irrelevant ads, people, news and topics. Enjoy Twitter/X as it was intended!

We don't collect any information about you. This extension is open source, the code can be found here: https://github.com/pashakhomchenko/TwitterAdBlocker

If you have suggestions on how to improve Twitter/X Ad Blocker, email me at devdevdev808@gmail.com or create a new issue here: https://github.com/pashakhomchenko/TwitterAdBlocker/issues
